title: Half Life 2 Cinematic Mod 13 beta 4
description:
Important notes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢This is a graphical / music total conversion. It looks and sounds very different compared to vanilla HL2.
 It's free, so don't complain: If you don't like the mod, you can delete it and play something else. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢To play this mod, you must own Half Life 2 + Episode 1 + Episode 2 fully installed and unlocked! (= started at least once) You cannot play without Episode 2 content!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Remember to activate "High Quality" graphic settings in the options dialog. Especially the model setting must be at "High" or you'll get facial animation errors with HD models.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢You must enable HDR, when using the dynamic shadow enhanced maps. (Looks very weird and unnatural in LDR)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢If you are using HD characters, please re-initiate them with the new character pimper after updating the CM!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Foreign language users: Please reinitialize your preferred language with the configurator.

Purpose of this mod
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Unified Engine; play the game (HL2 / EP1 / EP2) with the latest Orangebox engine / Advanced HDR / Dynamic Shadows
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Enhance the old HL2 maps with HDR, blooming, color-correction, new props, dynamic shadows
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Eliminate all blurry / Low-res textures with new Hi-res textures and/or Hi-res-Detail-Overlays
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Give the HL2 trilogy a more stressed, darker and uncomfortable look
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Enhance the soundtrack with a semi-dynamic new Hollywood-style music
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Add optional HD characters 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Add more replay-value

Hardware requirements
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢DX9 capable graphics hardware with minimum 512 MB VRAM. (1 GB recommended)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢3 GB RAM (4 GB recommended)

Software requirements
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fully installed Steam client. You can't start the mod without Steam running.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fully installed and unlocked HL2 / EP1 / EP2. Make sure, you have started those games in the past.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Source SDK (SDK, Base, Base 2007) installed (you can get them in Steam | Tools).

Installation instructions

Download and unpack the RAR archive. You will get a setup.exe with some subfolders. Do not unpack the archive in the subfolder. Just run setup.exe and follow the onscreen-instructions.

The mod has to be installed into the "common" folder inside the Steam directory structure. The installer will try to direct you to the right point. During installation the setup will migrate some VPK files from your half-life 2 installation into the mod directory.

Please assure the complete download of Half-Life 2 and its episodes, before trying to install the mod. Start HL2, EP1 and EP2 at least one time.

The installation will take a while
